Package environment

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • environment.Main
  • public class Main
extends javafx.application.Application
    Main class hosting the javafx Application. Gets called on start of the program and is the base for the javafx application. Links up to the homepage scene and provides some basic styles / layouts for the entire program (like fonts or backgrounds).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wolkenfarmer

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application

      • input

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input
        Input handling. This ArrayList gets filled / used in start(Stage) by the scene listeners. In this scene it's only used for a short cut to close the program (Esc).

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method of the program calling launch. Starts the application by calling launch(args) which calls up start.
        Parameters:
        args - Used for calling launch (javafx Application)
        See Also:
        Javafx Application documentation, start(Stage)

      • start

        public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        (Builds) and starts the javafx application. Creates the stage (window) for the program and shows a temporary loading-screen.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Parameters:
        stage - Makes up the window and is required for a javafx application.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        Javafx Application start() documentation
